abstract: The activist shareholder Carl C. Icahn may have won three seats on Yahoo’s board, but he won’t be attending Yahoo’s shareholder meeting Friday.
snippet: The activist shareholder Carl C. Icahn may have won three seats on Yahoo’s board, but he won’t be attending Yahoo’s shareholder meeting Friday.
lead_paragraph: The shareholder advocate, Carl C. Icahn, may have won three board seats from Yahoo in his high-profile battle with the company’s management, but he won’t be attending Yahoo’s annual shareholder meeting Friday.

headline.main: Icahn Won’t Be Yahooing at Shareholder Meeting
